statements: SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, invasive_country FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE origin_country = 'Australia';
SELECT species_name, spread_rate FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE spread_rate > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_species FROM InvasiveSpecies;
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE introduction_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE species_name = 'Asian Carp';
SELECT species_name, invasive_country FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE origin_country = 'China' ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE spread_rate > 5.0 AND invasive_country = 'United States' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, origin_country, invasive_country FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE introduction_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT species_name, spread_rate FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE origin_country <> invasive_country ORDER BY spread_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE threat_level > 3
SELECT species_name, geographic_origin FROM InvasiveSpecies ORDER BY species_name DESC
SELECT * FROM ObservationRecord WHERE observation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND observation_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT species_name, location FROM ObservationRecord JOIN InvasiveSpecies ON ObservationRecord.species_id = InvasiveSpecies.species_id
SELECT species_id, species_name, introduction_date FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE geographic_origin = 'Australia'
SELECT species_id, species_name, threat_level FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE threat_level > 2 ORDER BY species_name DESC
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies INNER JOIN ObservationRecord ON InvasiveSpecies.species_id = ObservationRecord.species_id WHERE ObservationRecord.location = 'California'
SELECT species_id, species_name, introduction_date FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE introduction_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY introduction_date ASC
SELECT species_id, geographic_origin, COUNT(species_id) AS observation_count FROM ObservationRecord GROUP BY species_id, geographic_origin HAVING COUNT(species_id) > 2 ORDER BY observation_count DESC
SELECT species_id, species_name, observation_date FROM InvasiveSpecies LEFT JOIN ObservationRecord ON InvasiveSpecies.species_id = ObservationRecord.species_id ORDER BY observation_date DESC
SELECT species_id, scientific_name, common_name, origin_country FROM Species;
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE origin_country='Australia';
SELECT sighting_id, location, sighting_date FROM Sightings ORDER BY sighting_date DESC;
SELECT common_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sightings FROM Species JOIN Sightings ON Species.species_id = Sightings.species_id GROUP BY common_name ORDER BY total_sightings DESC;
SELECT monitoring_id, location, monitoring_date FROM Monitoring WHERE monitoring_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT scientific_name, common_name FROM Species WHERE origin_country = 'USA';
SELECT species_id, scientific_name, common_name, location FROM Species JOIN Sightings ON Species.species_id = Sightings.species_id WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT monitoring_date, COUNT(monitoring_id) FROM Monitoring GROUP BY monitoring_date ORDER BY COUNT(monitoring_id) DESC;

SELECT scientific_name, location FROM Species JOIN Sightings ON Species.species_id = Sightings.species_id JOIN Monitoring ON Sightings.location = Monitoring.location WHERE sighting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaritimeAuthorities;
SELECT authority_name, location FROM MaritimeAuthorities WHERE authority_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, threat_level FROM InvasiveSpecies ORDER BY threat_level DESC;
SELECT observation_id, observation_date, observer_name FROM SpeciesObservations WHERE species_id = 2 AND ecosystem_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MarineEcosystems WHERE location LIKE '%Ocean%';
SELECT authority_name, location FROM MaritimeAuthorities;
SELECT * FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT ecosystem_name, location FROM MarineEcosystems ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM SpeciesObservations WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT authority_name, ecosystem_name, observation_date FROM MaritimeAuthorities JOIN SpeciesObservations ON MaritimeAuthorities.authority_id = SpeciesObservations.species_id JOIN MarineEcosystems ON SpeciesObservations.ecosystem_id = MarineEcosystems.ecosystem_id;
SELECT * FROM MaritimeAuthorities;
SELECT authority_name, authority_id FROM MaritimeAuthorities ORDER BY authority_name DESC;
SELECT sighting_date, quantity, status FROM MonitoringData WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT species_name, threat_level FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE threat_level > 3 ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT ecosystem_name, COUNT(*) AS 'Total Sightings' FROM MarineEcosystems JOIN Sightings ON MarineEcosystems.ecosystem_id = Sightings.ecosystem_id GROUP BY ecosystem_name;
SELECT * FROM MaritimeAuthorities;
SELECT authority_name, authority_id FROM MaritimeAuthorities WHERE authority_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MarineEcosystems WHERE ecosystem_name LIKE '%coral reef%';
SELECT species_name, threat_level FROM InvasiveSpecies WHERE threat_level > 2 ORDER BY threat_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sightings JOIN MonitoringData ON Sightings.sighting_id = MonitoringData.sighting_id WHERE status = 'reported';
